title: Menubar improvements
description: View history, perform more actions etc

title: ChatGPT Integration
description: Use prompts and your own OpenAI API key to process your transcripts

title: More export options
description: Vote on this if you want us to improve the export feature

title: Allow translation of segments
description: Right now you can only use DeepL with the full transcript view. If you want to be able to translate all the individual segments in your transcript, vote for this.
